item.title: Custom Study Desk
item.description: My partner and I recently started renting an old place in Palo Alto. With COVID, we’ve been working from home for almost two years now, and sharing a desk at times things felt a little cramped (especially with the occsional electronics project) I’m no expert in woodwork, so decided to 3D model it before building the desk. This also helped as my Father, who’s a carpender could give me tips on a shared screen.
